comments:
After some simple additions of report items to a report, the data set no longer 
displays the list of available columns.  Closing report and reopening it does 
not help.  Closing Eclipse and reopening it does not help. Report design is 
attached.

Created an attachment (id=27407)
BIRT report design file

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 109855 ***
